This page provides access to all VegVault-related resources including the database, publications, code, and presentation materials.

## VegVault Database

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}

### Primary Database Access

**VegVault v1.0.0 (SQLite Database - Recommended)**
[Download Database v1.0.0](https://doi.org/10.48700/datst.t21cz-2nq071){.btn}

Please review our [Database Access Guidelines](/website/database_access.qmd#guidelines-for-data-reuse-and-citation) for proper usage and citation requirements.

:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

```{r}
#| label: vegvault-logo
#| echo: false
knitr::include_graphics(
  here::here(
    "Outputs/Figures/website/VegVault_logo.png"
  )
)
```

:::

::::

### Alternative Format

**VegVault v1.0.0 (Flat Files - Not Recommended)**
[Download Database v1.0.0 as Flat Files](https://doi.org/10.48700/datst.thktf-5rr35){.btn}

::: {.callout-warning}
**Note**: Flat files are provided for accessibility but are not the preferred method. Many files exceed 1GB and may be difficult to load. We strongly recommend using the SQLite database with [{vaultkeepr}](https://bit.ly/vaultkeepr) for optimal performance.
:::

## Software & Tools

### {vaultkeepr} R Package

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="75%"}

**Official R package for VegVault database interaction**
[{vaultkeepr} Documentation & Download](https://bit.ly/vaultkeepr){.btn}

The package provides:

- Easy database connection and querying
- Data filtering and extraction functions
- Automatic citation generation
- [![Codecov-test-coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/OndrejMottl/vaultkeepr/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/OndrejMottl/vaultkeepr?branch=main) code coverage with comprehensive testing
:::

::: {.column width="25%"}
```{r}
#| label: vaultkeepr-logo
#| echo: false
knitr::include_graphics(
  "https://ondrejmottl.github.io/vaultkeepr/reference/figures/vaultkeeper_logo.png"
)
```
:::
